text: The men's decathlon event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 12 and 13 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Andrei Krauchanka ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Pascal Behrenbruch ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Arkadiy Vasilyev ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 12-13 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
